name: saoke_huydong
description: This table stores detailed records of financial transactions and account activities.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the transaction was processed.

columns.name: nhom_cn
columns.description: Code representing the group of branches involved in the transaction.

columns.name: cn
columns.description: Code identifying the specific branch involved in the transaction.

columns.name: ten_cn
columns.description: The name of the branch involved in the transaction.

columns.name: ma_loai
columns.description: Code representing the type or category of the transaction.

columns.name: thi_truong
columns.description: The market or segment where the transaction takes place.

columns.name: thanhphan_kinhte
columns.description: The economic sector involved in the transaction.

columns.name: acct_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account involved in the transaction.

columns.name: period
columns.description: The time period during which the transaction occurs.

columns.name: period_type
columns.description: The type of period (e.g., monthly, quarterly) for the transaction.

columns.name: gl_code
columns.description: Code used in the general ledger to classify the transaction.

columns.name: loai_tien
columns.description: The type of currency used in the transaction.

columns.name: tk2
columns.description: A secondary account involved in the transaction.

columns.name: tk3
columns.description: A tertiary account involved in the transaction.

columns.name: tk_nhnn
columns.description: Account with the central bank involved in the transaction.

columns.name: laisuat
columns.description: The interest rate applied to the transaction.

columns.name: tienlai_duchi
columns.description: The amount of interest accrued but not yet paid.

columns.name: tienlai_thucchi
columns.description: The amount of interest that has been paid.

columns.name: kyhan_loaitien
columns.description: The term or duration associated with the currency type.

columns.name: loai_kyhan
columns.description: The type of term (e.g., short-term, long-term) for the transaction.

columns.name: kyhan_so
columns.description: The numerical representation of the term duration.

columns.name: laisuat_dcv
columns.description: The interest rate for DCV (possibly a specific financial product).

columns.name: tien_denhan
columns.description: The amount due at maturity of the financial product.

columns.name: ngay_daohan
columns.description: The date when the financial product matures.

columns.name: songay_conlai
columns.description: The number of days remaining until maturity.

columns.name: client_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: client_name
columns.description: The name of the client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: ngay_moso
columns.description: The date when the account was opened.

columns.name: acct_type
columns.description: The type of account involved in the transaction.

columns.name: acct_type_desc
columns.description: A description of the account type.

columns.name: ma_nguoiquanly
columns.description: The code identifying the manager responsible for the account.

columns.name: ten_nguoiquanly
columns.description: The name of the manager responsible for the account.

columns.name: client_type
columns.description: The type or category of the client.

columns.name: ngay_tattoan
columns.description: The date when the account was settled or closed.

columns.name: profit_centre
columns.description: The profit center associated with the transaction.

columns.name: sodu
columns.description: The balance of the account at a given time.

columns.name: sodu_qd
columns.description: The balance adjusted for regulatory purposes.

columns.name: ngaymo_cif
columns.description: The date when the CIF (Customer Information File) was opened.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state or province associated with the transaction.

columns.name: country
columns.description: The country associated with the transaction.

columns.name: class_5
columns.description: A classification code for the transaction.

columns.name: industry
columns.description: The industry sector associated with the transaction.

columns.name: business
columns.description: The business or company involved in the transaction.

columns.name: major_category
columns.description: The primary category of the transaction.

columns.name: cmnd_mst
columns.description: Identification number or tax code of the client.

columns.name: registered_branch
columns.description: The branch where the client or account is registered.

columns.name: registered_date
columns.description: The date when the client or account was registered.

columns.name: registered_state
columns.description: The state where the client or account is registered.

columns.name: registered_state_desc
columns.description: Description of the registered state.

columns.name: ngay_taituc
columns.description: The date when the account or contract was renewed.

columns.name: date_sync_date
columns.description: The date when the data was last synchronized.
